5 #include <ros/ros.h>
6 
7 #include <vector>
8 #include <map>
9 
10 #include "bb_util/cue.hpp"
11 #include "bb_util/cue_msg.h"
12 #include "bb_util/cue_list.h"
13 
14 std::vector<ros::Subscriber> subs;
15 ros::Publisher pub;
16 
17 // Map to store an entry for each cue's current state
18 std::vector<bb_util::Cue> cues;
19 
23 void cue_callback(const bb_util::cue_msg::ConstPtr& msg){
24  bb_util::cue_msg cue_msg = *msg;
25  bb_util::Cue cue = bb_util::Cue::toCue(cue_msg);
26 
27  // Search for the correct element and sum the reliabilities
28  // of each cue.
29  double reliability_sum = 0;
30  int goal_idx = -1;
31  for (int i = 0; i < cues.size(); i++){
32  if (goal_idx == -1 && cues[i] == cue) goal_idx = i;
33  reliability_sum = reliability_sum + cues[i].getReliability();
34  }
35 
36  // Normalise the reliabilities to get the weight.
37  cue.setRelativeWeight(cue.getReliability() / reliability_sum);
38  cues[goal_idx] = cue; // Update the cue in the list
39 }
40 
44 inline bb_util::cue_list cue_list_to_msg_list(std::vector<bb_util::Cue> cue_list){
45  std::vector<bb_util::cue_msg> msg_list;
46 
47  for (int i = 0; i < cue_list.size(); i++)
48  msg_list.push_back(bb_util::Cue::toMsg(cue_list[i]));
49 
50  bb_util::cue_list cue_msg_list;
51  cue_msg_list.cues = msg_list;
52  return cue_msg_list;
53 }
54 
55 int main(int argc, char **argv){
56  ros::init(argc, argv, "cue_manager");
57  ros::NodeHandle n;
58 
59  // Defined for ease, would be better to have this user-defined somewhere
60  // else. E.g.a config file.
61  std::vector<std::string> cue_nodes = { "dummy_wind_node", "dummy_light_node" };
62 
63  // Set up subscribers for each cue node
64  for (int i = 0; i < cue_nodes.size(); i++)
65  subs.push_back(n.subscribe(cue_nodes[i], 1000, cue_callback));
66 
67  // Set up a publisher to advertise a list of cues
68  pub = n.advertise<bb_util::cue_list>("cue_list", 1);
69 
70  // Retrieve updated cue list and broadcast to the network
71  while(ros::ok()){
72  // Check callbacks.
73  ros::spinOnce();
74 
75  // Translate to bb_util::cue_list and publish.
76  pub.publish(cue_list_to_msg_list(cues));
77  }
78 
79  return 0;
80 }
